Total school budget share

£413,390.84

£75,385.74 from total school budget share is funding de-delegated to local authority for central services when this was a maintained school. After the school becomes an academy, the local authority will keep £37,569.29 to provide those central services until 31 March 2022.

£46,024.77 from your total school budget share is an indicative amount that you may set aside for pupils with SEN.

Total protection funding

£41,743.41

Protection funding makes sure change in local authority average per pupil rate between 2020 to 2021 and 2021 to 2022 will not fall below your local authority guaranteed change of 0.19%.

Total pre-16 high needs £0
Where place numbers come from

Places are either rolled forward from 2020 to 2021 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.

Places are either rolled forward from 2020 to 2021 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.
